name: MovEX
introduce: MovEX is a DEX built to provide the best trading and liquidity provision experience for users and project developers on Sui. The core products of MovEX are 1) a concentrated liquidity AMM + order book hybrid liquidity Decentralized Exchange (DEX); 2) Intelligent Liquidity Allocation service, which automatically adjusts liquidity to boost capital efficiency and market-making returns; 3) ILO (initial liquidity offering) service for project developers which provides customized token launch options to maximize raised fund.
